en.title: Photo Gallery
en.subHeading: Take a gander throughout our spaces and past events to get a glimpse at what you can experience here at Mosteiro.

photogallery.title: Photo Gallery
photogallery.description: Take a peek yourself of our (and hopefully "yours" in the future) spaces and see if you find it appealing!
